name: Arkanoid (itch) (micaluzbenitez)
description:
Arkanoid 2.0 How to play arkanoid?

You have to move the bar to the sides in order to catch the ball as itfalls and make it rise again. The objective of this game is to break all the bricks that are in the upper part. You have five lives, if you can't pick up the! ball in time you lose one. If you manage to clear the screen, you Will pass the level, and so on.

- 3 levels.

MULTIBALL POWERUP
2 extra balls appear in the game from the last ball position, once they are lost they cannot be recovered until the same powerup is is caught again. Advantage: if you lose them, they do not take life!

FIREBALL POWERUP
The ball will go through all the blocks breaking all of them in 1 hit! (Except for unbreakable blocks)

PADDLE POWERUP
The width of the paddle can increase or decrease until you lose the next life or win the level.

BALL POWERUP
The speed of the ball decreases until you lose the next life the or win the level.
